Author: stickythewallflower
Text: I think I know which youtuber you’re referring to, just a heads up she’s notorious in certain circles for not being completely truthful about her clothing size. On another note, clothing sizes are pretty bullshit, I’d recommend sticking to measurements since vanity sizing has taken over many brands.

Author: karentakethekids
Text: Ok first of all sizes dont indicate anything. At my lowest weight when i was literally a walking skeleton my hips still did not fit into xs jeans. Second of all, you probably have body dismorphia. I swear i could literally look at someone who has the same height, weight and bodytype as me but still think that they look different. Nevertheless, sending you love and strength
